item.description:
Hi All,

First off, thanks to everyone for coming to our last meetup, and welcome to all the new members! This is an announcement for the next scheduled meetup, which will be on the 22nd, at 7pm. A big thanks goes out to Burt; he found an excellent place to hold our next meetup. We have a conference room at the Riverfront Office Park in Cambridge, the details of which you can find here.

With a proper meeting room, we'll be able to go over the items we did not get a chance to cover last time, like discussion of plugins and grails war stories. Please feel free to open some discussion in the message boards if you have something particular you'd like us to discuss.
item.name: The 2nd Boston Grails meetup!
